Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Increases the mandatory retirement age of members of the uniformed force of the fire department of the city of New York from sixty-five to sixty-seven
Summary: Increases the mandatory retirement age of members of the uniformed force of the fire department of the city of New York from sixty-five to sixty-seven.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the mandatory retirement age of members of the uniformed force of the fire department of the city of New York from sixty-five to sixty-seven
